pr_title: JENKINS-62088 Fix correct fonts not loading for buttons and plugin manager filter

timeline.message: Fix correct fonts not loading for buttons and plugin manager filter

timeline.bodyText:
https://css-tricks.com/overriding-default-button-styles/

Buttons have their own font-family, so don’t inherit from the cascade unless you tell it to.
timeline.author: timja

timeline.bodyText: I assume this was supposed to be a REM, my IDE wasn't happy with this value and everything else is a REM
timeline.author: timja

timeline.bodyText: Did you verify that this font-size has lower preference than the one specified on buttons.less. If the  inherit takes preference, buttons will have whichever font-size their parent has.
timeline.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText:
buttons.less has higher specificity by using:
.yui-button button, so should be fine, can probably remove it from here since it's set there as well?
replies.author: timja

replies.bodyText: Nah, we can leave it in case someone tries to use unstyled buttons for some reason.
replies.author: fqueiruga
